rooms.name: Entrance Hallway and Living Area
rooms.description: The entrance leads into a spacious open-plan living area that includes the kitchen area. The layout ensures wide corridors for wheelchair accessibility and adherence to Vastu principles by orienting the main entrance towards the northeast.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. It is designed to maximize space and efficiency while remaining within budget constraints. Includes wheelchair-accessible countertops and appliances.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A flexible dining space that can serve as a transitional area between the kitchen and living room. The design ensures clear pathways for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space located near the entrance to maximize natural light and maintain privacy. The room is designed with adjustable furniture for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom ensuring easy access from the main living area. The room is designed with Vastu principles in mind, placed towards the north-east corner.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A wheelchair-accessible main entrance on the northeast side, ensuring energy efficiency and compliance with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Strategically placed windows across rooms to maximize natural light. They include low thresholds for easy cleaning and maintenance.

additional_features.name: Large Garden
additional_features.description: A spacious garden designed around the house perimeter with accessible pathways, native vegetation, and seating areas to maintain budget-friendly landscaping while ensuring low maintenance.

additional_features.name: Wheelchair Access Ramps
additional_features.description: Ramps integrated into the design to ensure every level is accessible. These ramps have gentle slopes and non-slip surfaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is designed with privacy and comfort in mind. It has a built-in wardrobe that maximizes space while following Vastu guidelines by placing it on the southern wall.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom that is designed for flexibility. The room can be used as a study or guest space if needed.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A bathroom designed to be wheelchair friendly with grab bars and sufficient turning space.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A central staircase with ramp alternatives to ensure accessibility between floors.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: A balcony attached to the master bedroom for additional space and natural light, designed following Vastu guidelines by facing east.
